card.name: Clash of Titans
card.text: (Chosen ally of S or higher power attacks target enemy of S or higher power. Cannot be dodged.)

card.name: Fateful Reunion
card.text: (Cast from ally) (Bring any character (ignore Disguises) to this location. Reveal if Hidden)

card.name: A Hasty Purchase
card.text: (Joseph’s Truck during WORLD fight)

card.name: Passing Car
card.text: (Use in an Urban environment) (Create a Car Mount that is Escaping.)

card.name: Police Interference
card.text: (Use when appropriate) (Target character is Immobilized until this player’s next turn. May force target to perform an Interact) (At start, or at end??)

card.name: River Burial
card.text: (Use when a character dies or a thrown object misses. Exile the relevant target)

card.name: Road Roller
card.text: (Urban) (Massive Weight)

card.name: Shotgun
card.text: (Ranged Attack. Limited effectiveness)

card.name: So It's the Same Type Of Stand

set.picURL: /So It's the Same Type Of Stand.full.jpg

card.text: (Choose an ally and enemy, both Stand Users, who are fighting. The ally must have Knowledge of the enemy’s Stand) (II - The ally gains the enemy’s Stand ability)

card.name: Stolen Motorcycle
card.text: (Play to a character without Buffoon or Child)

card.name: Cry For Help
card.text: (Alert ally? Unclear mechanic) (Polnareff during Alessi)

card.name: Desperate Locomotion
card.text: (Find better name?) (Use in an Urban field. All Stand Users may move as if Mounted as long as they are in an urban environment.) (Qualify so inappropriate Stands can’t?)

card.name: Desperate Warning
card.text: (Communicate Knowledge to target ally.) (Knowledge is yet Undefined)

card.name: Dying Discovery
card.text: (Use when a Strategist dies. Gain Knowledge of an opponent’s Stand, and communicate it to target ally) (Knowledge as a mechanic does not yet exist)

card.name: Group Photo
card.text: (Play when you have 5+ allies in play. Gain mana. Holder has Resolve if it is one of the allies that was present.)

card.name: Heroic Pull
card.text: (Cast from a damaged ally. Target ally Moves, and may successfully dodge. Sacrifice caster)

card.name: Heroic Tackle (Alternate)
card.text: (Sacrifice unit; prevent attack on ally)

card.name: Malena's Care
card.text: (Use on injured character. Fully heal, and create Civilian. Vulnerable?)

card.name: Miraculous Blood Transplant
card.text: (Use when a vampire’s corpse is in close range. Revive ally corpse.)

card.name: Narrow Escape
card.text: (Dodge incoming attack) (New name, to differentiate from Escape?)

card.name: Party Trick
card.text: (Target ally. Gain mana. If target is owned by an opponent, they become Terrified)

card.name: Reinforcements
card.text: (Summon Ally with haste)

card.name: What Will Happen?
card.text: (Target ally; Pick at random: Successfully avoid incoming attack; Summon or Call any number of allies to target ally, and nullify incoming attack; Do not block the attack, and any damage from it is lethal)

card.name: Blind
card.text: (Play on successful attack. Blind defender)

card.name: Brutal Killing
card.text: (Use when an enemy is killed by an ally. Enrage any enemies present.)

card.name: Close Shave
card.text: (Use when disguised; Gain attack of opportunity) (Niche due to being already disguised)

card.name: Escape to the Sewers
card.text: (This character may escape if they can Move at all, unless they are Intercepted)

card.name: Helpful Saleswoman
card.text: (Use from ally) (If this character’s Limb is severed, retrieve it. Create a Civilian, then this character murders it.)

card.name: Idolatrous Rage
card.text: (Play when a Comrade Disguise is Revealed. You may attack the source of the Disguise any number of times until they do not take damage.) (Needs clarification)

card.name: Inscription of Doom
card.text: (Field Modifier?) (Gain Attack of Opportunity against up to two target enemies)

card.name: Knowledge of Ally
card.text: (Reveal a Comrade Disguise directed towards you)

card.name: Near Miss
card.text: (Use when this character would suffer fatal damage. Prevent this damage, and gain an Attack of Opportunity on the attacker.) (Polnareff attacks DIO)

card.name: Righteous Slaughter
card.text: (Chaka on dad)

card.name: Senator Phillips
card.text: (Use in City; Choose ally) (I - Create a Civilian grouped with the ally, with “Anyone in this unit’s group has Mounted”. II - Summon X civilians, then kill them. III - The civilian gains “Sacrifice: Destroy target source of Mount”)

card.name: Toth's Predictions
card.text: (Fuck shit up, fate style)

card.name: Willing Sacrifices
card.text: (Fully heal a Vampire character)

card.name: Zealous Sacrifice
card.text: (Sacrifice ally, gain mana) (Limit to high power?)

card.name: Clever Hiding Spot
card.text: (Use when a Mirror is available. Gain Hidden Disguise)

card.name: Coffee Flavored Gum
card.text: (Consume to call ally to current position?)

card.name: Four Iced Teas
card.text: (Target 2-4 allies. Refresh targets. Gain mana)

card.name: Fun with Magnets
card.text: (Secret?) (Apply to ally) (When this character is next attacked with Melee, abort that attack. The attacker may no longer act this turn. Discard this card.)

card.name: Improvised Armor
card.text: (Secret?) (When this character is next hit with any number of projectile attacks, reduce the total damage to Minimal. Discard this card.) (Minimal means on-hit effects trigger, but no crippling)

card.name: Look, Don't Touch
card.text: (Force target character to Interact)

card.name: Reveal Position
card.text: (Play from character with long range ability or designation. Reveal target unit’s position with Sound) (Geb with The Fool’s Glider)

card.name: Revealing Air
card.text: (Reveal Hidden or Invisible character) (Field Modifier?)

card.name: Self-Serving Betrayal
card.text: (Target enemy character attacks target ally that they can. If the defender takes damage from the attack, gain control of the attacker.)

card.name: Vile Distraction
card.text: (Interrupt an action. Some kind of limit?) (Polnareff in the tub)

card.name: Ambush
card.text: (What is the constraint?) (Attack of opportunity; On all?)

card.name: Ascend the Stairs
card.text: (How to do this?)

card.name: Bad Attitude
card.text: (Play to enemy; Target cannot act to help allies) (Must defend self?)

card.name: By Any Means
card.text: (Use when injured) (Blind target enemy in close range)

card.name: Claustophobic Car Ride
card.text: (Target any number of allies. These allies are Grouped until this players next upkeep) (Mount)

card.name: Coward's Burial
card.text: (Nukesaku in coffin)

card.name: Fake Death
card.text: (Use upon character taking damage. This character gains Faking Death Disguise.) (This Disguise starts with one charge counter. Remove one charge counter: Taunt and Interrupt target enemy)

card.name: A Familiar Street
card.text: (Use in an Urban Environment, when Moving or being Moved) (Arrive at a location of your choice) (Needs clarification. This would allow the retrieval of a corpse, but what else?)

card.name: Flanking Maneuver
card.text: (Isolate up to two allies. As long as there are more non-Isolated allies than fighting enemies, the Isolated allies are Hidden and gain Attack of Opportunity on any enemy) (Dispelling Hidden removes them from this effect)

card.name: Heart Stopper
card.text: (Enhance Faking Death Disguise; It cannot be Dispelled) (Very niche right now)

card.name: Leap to Safety
card.text: (Any number of allies Escape)

card.name: Proper Motivation
card.text: (Target ally and user are Grouped)

card.name: Sinking Car
card.text: (New name?) (Provides shelter from the ground or something)
